headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 1 critical, 20 high, 18 medium. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Chişinău (RMO/LUKK); plus 18 other bases. 18 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is low cloud base, mist and very low visibility  — most notably around Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), London Luton (LTN/EGGW) and Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR). Network hotspots: Billund (BLL/EKBI), Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS), Valencia (VLC/LEVC) and 2 others. Primary drivers: cold‑temperature performance penalties, low cloud base and snow / blowing snow. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Billund (BLL/EKBI), Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 7 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 400 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 2 km, cloud base around 200 ft | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; cloud base around 200 ft; below alternate minima (current METAR) | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft and 15 others. Worst affected now: Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: snow; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; crosswind limitation risk (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, crosswind limitations, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; crosswind limitation risk (drivers: crosswind limitations, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Valencia (VLC/LEVC) — CRIT: strong gusts risk; cloud base around 0 ft (drivers: operational constraints) | Turku (TKU/EFTU) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) and 1 others. Changed since last run: Billund (BLL/EKBI), Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS), Valencia (VLC/LEVC), Turku (TKU/EFTU), Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) and 2 others.
